import React from "react"; import ArifImage from "../assets/images/arif.jpg"; import PutriImage from "../assets/images/putri.jpg"; const Wedding = () => { return (

And one of His signs is that He created for you spouses from among yourselves so that you may find comfort in them. And He has placed between you compassion and mercy. Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

(QS Ar-Rum 21)

The wedding of

Putri Fatimah Azzahra
(PUPUT)

daughter of

Bp. Burhan Herwadi & Ibu Yiyis Dewi Darwisah

&

Arif Rachman Husen
(Arif)

daughter of

Bp. Tengku Husen Yusup & Ibu U Solihah

); }; export default Wedding;
